title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2848/93 of 19 October 1993 derogating, for the 1993/94 marketing year, from Regulation (EEC) No 2602/90 laying down detailed rules concerning citrus fruit producers' organizations
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2848/93 of 19 October 1993 derogating, for the 1993/94 marketing year, from Regulation (EEC) No 2602/90 laying down detailed rules concerning citrus fruit producers' organizations
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Notwithstanding point 1 of Article 5 of Regulation (EEC) No 2602/90, in respect of the 1993/94 marketing year, the date on which new memberships must take effect is hereby amended to 15 December 1993.
The rules of association of producers' organizations are not affected by the application of the first paragraph.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 October 1993.
For the Commission
